sections.heading: Why it matters to file AOC-4

list.title: Is AOC-4 required every year?
points: Yes, all businesses must file AOC-4 every year within 30 days of their annual general meeting.

list.title: Can you file AOC-4 online?
points: Yes. AOC-4 is sent electronically to the MCA portal with a certified auditor's attachment.

list.title: What will happen if AOC-4 isn't filed?
points: The company and its directors could have to pay big fines, and the company could be marked as not following the rules.

list.title: Does AOC-4 apply to private companies and OPCs?
points: Yes, every OPC and private limited company has to file AOC-4.
